hesyspage.title: Style sheet
hesyspage.desc: This CSS file is used by all dialog boxes
hesyspage.contents:
<FONT size="9"></FONT><FONT face="@MS Gothic"></FONT>html{
height: 100%;  
}
body{
background: rgba(244,240,244,1);
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(244,240,244,1) 0%, rgba(171,171,171,1) 100%);
background: -webkit-gradient(left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(244,240,244,1)), color-stop(100%, rgba(171,171,171,1)));
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(244,240,244,1) 0%, rgba(171,171,171,1) 100%);
background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(244,240,244,1) 0%, rgba(171,171,171,1) 100%);
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(244,240,244,1) 0%, rgba(171,171,171,1) 100%);
background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(244,240,244,1) 0%, rgba(171,171,171,1) 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#f4f0f4', endColorstr='#ababab', GradientType=0 );
color:#000;font-family:Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:small;list-style-type:square}
h1,h2{color:#117DAF;font-size:large;font-weight:700}
